ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(Insurance__c,"Complete"), ISBLANK(GL_Ins_Exp_Date__c),
AND( OR( RecordType.Name = "Brinks", RecordType.Name = "Charter", RecordType.Name = "EarthLink", RecordType.Name = "Frontier", RecordType.Name = "MDP", RecordType.Name = "MDP National Retail", RecordType.Name = "Optimum", RecordType.Name = "SafeHaven", RecordType.Name = "T-Mobile FFL", RecordType.Name = "Viasat", RecordType.Name = "Viasat Fulfillment", RecordType.Name = "Windstream", RecordType.Name = "Windstream D2D", RecordType.Name = "Telogix", RecordType.Name = "Optimum Commercial", RecordType.Name = "Spectrum Commercial", RecordType.Name = "Verizon D2D/COM", RecordType.Name = "Xfinity")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the expiration date of the General Liability Insurance
